name: Summer Runner (itch)
description:
The pool party of the season is happening today right below you.  Just rappel down a tall building to join your friends.  Eat a hotdog AND a burger and play fun pool games.  Jeremiah is looking extra good today or is it just those margaritas you had?

GREEN with Envy

Don't you just hate it when your friends are having a good time, getting tan and drunk and flaunting their wobbly bits for all to see while you're stuck at work in the Tallest Building of All Time??  Me too!!  That's why Jerry and I made this game for you.

A Summer to Remember

Our theme was Endless Summer, so obviously we had to make an endless runner.  As you fly closer and closer to the pool party below, you must collect ice cream cones to keep your energy up and avoid bombs.  Friendly seagulls may try to help you on your journey, so watch out for them.

What did we use?

Gamemaker Studio

Where can I find your other games?

Our other games can be found at our website. (http://www.aklosismedia.com)

Credits
  • Music by Martin Broder created in Ableton Live
  • All art copyright Jeremiah Benson

Developed by @aklosismedia and @jbenson805 for #SummerGameJam
